coreframe.service
Interface CoreService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
BusinessLogicService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDaemonService, AdapterManagementService, DbPoolService, DistributeFileWriteService, JcsCacheService, PerformanceMonitorService, PerformanceRecordService
public interface CoreService
extends Service

coreframe core service CoreService 구현 객체는 coreFRAME의 핵심 service 로 다른 service 보다 먼저 수행이 되며, CoreService 가 모두 수행이 된 상태에서 일반 Service 구현객체가 수행된다.

Since:
5.0
Author:
Sungkwon, Kim

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface coreframe.service.Service
PAUSED, PAUSING, RESUMING, RUNNING, STARTING, STOPPED, STOPPING

getInstanceID, getName, getState, getStatusText, setCoreApplication, setServiceManager, start, stop
 

Method Detail

setDependencyServiceIds

void setDependencyServiceIds(java.lang.String serviceIds)
이 서비스 수행에 필요한 종속 service Id 목록을 설정한다.

getDependencyServiceIdArray

serviceIds service id array
